author: nottherealtar
install_msg: Arc Raiders cog installed! Use `[p]arc` to see current map rotations.
name: ArcRaiders
short: Track Arc Raiders map rotations and events
description: A comprehensive Arc Raiders map rotation tracker. Shows current and upcoming map conditions, event schedules, and supports automatic hourly updates. Based on the 24-hour UTC rotation cycle with major and minor events across all 5 maps.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores guild settings for auto-update channels. No personal user data is stored.
